associateMemberAccount.description: Enables the user to associate a specified AWS account with Amazon Macie as a member account.

associateS3Resources.description: Enables the user to associate specified S3 resources with Amazon Macie for monitoring and data classification.

aws:SourceArn.description: Allow access to the specified actions only when the request operates on the specified aws resource

disassociateMemberAccount.description: Enables the user to remove the specified member account from Amazon Macie.

disassociateS3Resources.description: Enables the user to remove specified S3 resources from being monitored by Amazon Macie.

aws:SourceArn.description: Allow access to the specified actions only when the request operates on the specified aws resource

listMemberAccounts.description: Enables the user to list all Amazon Macie member accounts for the current Macie master account.

listS3Resources.description: Enables the user to list all the S3 resources associated with Amazon Macie.

updateS3Resources.description: Enables the user to update the classification types for the specified S3 resources.

aws:SourceArn.description: Allow access to the specified actions only when the request operates on the specified aws resource
